lead_paragraph: KUIBYSHEV, Russia, Nov. 2 (Delayed) -- Moscow has become a regular target for vicious German aerial bombardment and four or five times a day the screams of sirens warn the people that raiders are approaching. The Germans, flying at great heights, bomb the city by day and night, according to Russian accounts.
abstract: USSR admits new German battles against Kalinin and Serpukhov, above and below Moscow; hard fighting reptd; USSR claims part of Kalinin retaken; Rostov battle slackens; Moscow raids incessant; Crimean news scarce; USSR submarine sinks 2 German transports, Black Sea
